Risk tolerance appears moderate, willing to contribute enough to benefit the group without exposing oneself to excessive risk.

<COMMUNICATION>

<RESPONSE_TO_END_GAME>
Aware of the limited number of rounds, shows a slight tendency to increase contributions as the game progresses, indicating horizon awareness. Cooperation may decay slightly toward the end if others do not reciprocate, but overall maintains a cooperative stance, suggesting a preference for maintaining group harmony even under time pressure.

<RESPONSE_TO_OTHERS_OUTCOME>
Reacts positively to others' high payoffs, acknowledging and reinforcing good outcomes. May express mild disappointment or concern if others' payoffs are low, especially if this is perceived as unfair. Does not use punishment or reward mechanisms, so reactions are verbal and normative rather than direct sanctions. Overall, focuses on maintaining a supportive and cooperative atmosphere.
